block.tutmod.weird_block: Very fucking weird block. I'd be careful around it if I was you...
item.tutmod.uranium_fuel: This is a uranium fuel ingot, it lasts so long that by the time it has run out the universe would've collapsed
tooltip.tutmod.uranium_detector.tooltip: This scans under where you click to see if there's uranium under
tooltip.tutmod.weird_block.tooltip: It scares me. The amount of souls trapped is... beyond our capable minds of understanding
